Text: Damn, Lobdell's still writing this. Any word on if he'll leave?

titans fans are still buying it, sadly. although not as much as when it was in the death of the family crossover!

TEEN TITANS #15 - 17th overall - 68,707 copies
TEEN TITANS #16 - 21st overall - 63,726 copies
TEEN TITANS #17 - 53rd overall - 39,186 copies
TEEN TITANS #18 - 50th overall - 42,055 copies

that's a big drop-off, but it's still up in the same area as green lantern corps and iron man. and lobdell will probably be safe anyway, he's buddies with jim lee and bob harras
